assignments.name: Add_Account_ID_to_Duplicate_List
assignments.label: Add Account ID to Duplicate List

choices.name: No_do_not_delete
choices.choiceText: No, do not delete {!PCV_Account.Name} - it is a legitimate account.

choices.name: Not_Sure_About_Deleting
choices.choiceText: Maybe, please show me the contact details from {!PCV_Account.Name}.

choices.name: Yes_Delete_this_Account
choices.choiceText: Yes, I certify that {!PCV_Account.Name} should be deleted.

decisions.description: Checks the account status to see if it is in delete.
decisions.name: Check_Account_Status
decisions.label: Check Account Status

fields.name: ValidationCompleted_Text
fields.fieldText:
Pre-Call Validation Complete: GREAT WORK!


{!PCV_Account.Name} has successfully been updated with the information you provided.

fields.name: Check_Contact_for_Deletion_Instructions
fields.fieldText:
Review Contact Information for Account Marked as DELETE


Please review the following contact information on the {!PCV_Account.Name} account to determine whether or not this is a valid account.


Name:

{!Individual_Contact_for_Deletion_check.Name}


Status:

{!Individual_Contact_for_Deletion_check.Status__c}


Email:

{!Individual_Contact_for_Deletion_check.Email}


Phone:

{!Individual_Contact_for_Deletion_check.Phone}


Description:

{!Individual_Contact_for_Deletion_check.Description}

fields.name: DeDupe_Step1_Instructions
fields.fieldText:
Review Account for Duplicates


{!PCV_Account.Account_with_Owner__c} is currently in status {!PCV_Account.Status__c}. For the first step in this process, we'll check for duplicates. During the following steps you'll be shown accounts that have already been identified as potential duplicates.


Please press 'Next' to continue.

fields.name: DeDupe_Step2_Instructions
fields.fieldText:
Review Account for Duplicates


Next, let's spot check a couple of Salesforce searches to see if there are any other duplicates of {!PCV_Account.Name}.


Click this link to run a quick search.


If you find a dupe, please enter it below by typing the account name.

fields.name: FinishAccountValidation_Instructions
fields.fieldText:
Validate Existing Data and Add Additional Data


The last step of pre-call validation {!PCV_Account.Name} is to validate the Website, Industry, Org Size, and Billing State.


Account Description

{!PCV_Account.Description}


Existing Data Sources

Account: Click Here

Contact List: Click Here

Website: {!CompanyWebsite}

Domain Name: {!CompanyDomain}


Additional Data Sources

Search LinkedIn

Search Google for Account Name

Search Google for Phone Number

Search Google for Address

{!DNB_Data}

fields.name: DeleteAccountCheckbox
fields.fieldText: Delete this Account: I certify that I cannot find conclusive information.
fields.helpText: Check this if you haven't been able to find conclusive information about this account.

fields.name: AccountName
fields.fieldText: Account Name

fields.name: Phone
fields.fieldText: Phone

fields.name: Website
fields.fieldText: Website

fields.name: Industry
fields.fieldText: Industry

fields.name: OrgSize
fields.fieldText: Org Size

fields.name: Validations_Completed
fields.fieldText: Validations Completed (Select Multiple with Command + Click)

fields.name: ParentAccountValidation_Instructions
fields.fieldText:
Review Account for Parent / Subsidiary Relationships


Next, let's check for any parent / subsidiary relationships for {!PCV_Account.Name}.


First, read through the about us section on LinkedIn.


Search LinkedIn


Then, search the companys "About section, "Press / News" section, and the footer of the company's website.


Website: {!CompanyWebsite}

Domain Name: {!CompanyDomain}


If you find a matching parent account in Salesforce, please enter it below by typing the account name.

fields.name: Pre_Call_Validation_Complete_DELETE_Instructions
fields.fieldText:
Pre-Call Validation Complete: Account Validated for DELETION


{!PCV_Account.Name} has successfully been marked as validation complete and moved to the appropriate user for deletion.

fields.name: Pre_Call_Validation_Complete_DUPLICATE_Instructions
fields.fieldText:
Pre-Call Validation Complete: Account Validated as a DUPLICATE


{!PCV_Account.Name} has successfully been marked as validation complete and flagged as a duplicate.

fields.name: Pre_Call_Validation_Complete_SUBSIDIARY_Instructions
fields.fieldText:
Pre-Call Validation Complete: Account Validated as a SUBSIDIARY


{!PCV_Account.Name} has successfully been marked as validation complete and flagged as a duplicate.

fields.name: Review_Duplicate_Account_Record_Instructions
fields.fieldText:
Check Duplicate Accounts


Account to be Validated


Name: {!PCV_Account.Name}

Website: {!PCV_Account.Website}

Domain: {!PCV_Account.Domain_Name__c}

Phone: {!PCV_Account.Phone}

Billing Address: {!FullBillingAddress}


Duplicate Account

Name: {!Duplicate_Account.Name}

Website: {!Duplicate_Account.Website}

Domain: {!Duplicate_Account.Domain_Name__c}

Phone: {!Duplicate_Account.Phone}

Billing Address: {!DupeFullBillingAddress}

fields.name: This_Account_is_a_Duplicate
fields.fieldText: The duplicate account listed is a match.

fields.name: Step_1_Failed_Instructions
fields.fieldText:
Review Account Information for Account Marked as DELETE


{!PCV_Account.Account_with_Owner__c} is currently in status {!PCV_Account.Status__c}. The current owner of the account is {!PCV_Account} Please confirm whether or not this account fake, out of business, or otherwise inactive.


Account Name:

{!PCV_Account.Name}

>> Search LinkedIn

>> Search Google

>> Review Account

>> {!DNB_Data}


Website:

{!PCV_Account.Website}


Domain:

{!PCV_Account.Domain_Name__c}


Phone:

{!PCV_Account.Phone}

>> Search Google


Billing Address:

{!FullBillingAddress}

>> Search Google


Account Description:

{!PCV_Account.Description}

fields.name: Should_this_account_be_deleted
fields.fieldText: Should this account be deleted?
